summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 3063 lux), cloud levels (up 437 m), and rainfall (up 0.2 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1371 m), light levels (up 5412 lux), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 436.9m lower than yesterday, 972.3m lower than past week, 1371.0m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1436.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2410m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
